subject: Add undo/redo functionality
body:
- Create useHistory hook for state history management (max 50 states)
- Integrate history into useAdState hook
- Add undo/redo buttons in header with disabled states
- Add keyboard shortcuts: Ctrl+Z (undo), Ctrl+Shift+Z / Ctrl+Y (redo)
- Skip history when typing in inputs to preserve native behavior

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Add undo/redo functionality
